reviews.customers_say: Customers find the tunic comfortable and true to size, with a perfect length for leggings and long sleeves. The houndstooth collar and cuffs add design interest, and the material feels smooth on the body, with one customer noting it's perfect for fall and winter wear. They appreciate its versatility, being suitable for both formal and casual occasions, and find it flattering on plus size figures, with one mentioning

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels good and looks good.
items.body: This top is nice. Looks as pictured. I added a black belt around the waist for added interest, (but you don’t have to). Got many compliments. The material isn’t thin, nor is it thick. I think it’s the perfect weight for this time of year and it is soft and comfortable. I purchased a large and I’m 5’6” and 180. An XL would have been too big. The sleeve length was perfect and the color is as shown (black/red check). Read more
items.author: Mary B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!!
items.body: I got the gray wisteria and it is absolutely beautiful!! I love it!! The length is perfect for leggings. The quality is better than expected. I wear a small and the small fits perfect. The material is soft and comfy. Read more
items.author: Ric Creeden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking top.
items.body: Perfect for the cooler weather. The fabric is soft, but substantial and drapes nicely, hiding my muffin top. I love that the zipper works so that I can wear it open neck or turtleneck. I am 5'8, 180 pounds and the Large fit me perfectly. The sleeves are long but the cuff is double sided so you can roll it up and still see the design. This top fits like a tunic so it's long enough to wear with leggings. I'm definitely ordering another on in a different color. Read more
items.author: Miz Dee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits true-to-size!
items.body: This is a lovely top that fits true-to-size (I am a 2XL) without binding. The material is lightweight and the color is saturated instead of faded. I am hesitant to order fitted items from these online stores. This one, however, was a pleasant surprise! I love this and will order more of different colors. Thanks for shipping so quickly! Read more
items.author: Rhonda Moore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: I love this long sweater. It is soft and comfortable and made of quality fabric. It’s so stylish and looks great with leggings or jeans. It washes nicely too. It’s so cute, I bought two. Read more
items.author: Cynthia M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!!!
items.body: I love this top! I bought one in grey also. Sizing is spot on. I like the material, it’s not super thick or thin and flimsy. The length is perfect, hits just below my bum so it’s perfect to wear with leggings. The v-neck isn’t too low but perfect to wear a necklace with. It’s not restrictive or tight across the back or arms. I’m 5’3, 145lbs and I ordered a large. Love it! Read more
items.author: R shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY HAPPY
items.body: Better than I thought it would be. Very happy. Nice material, very comfortable, great fit. Really cute. Read more
items.author: Vickey Raskow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tunic. Love it.
items.body: Very pretty and warm, Just like the picture, size is accurate. Like this very much. Read more
items.author: Feebie giacomini

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Blue, Black White, Houndstooth, Black Purple Snowflake, Coffee Leopard Print, Red Black, Black Red, Black Coffee, Gray Wisteria, Red Coffee, Coffee Houndstooth, Carbon Grey, Light Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
